SELECT /* seriesQuery.list 2013.08.21 최지순 */ A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID , A.CONTENTS_SERIES_NM , A.IMG_PATH , A.BRAND_ID , (SELECT BRAND_NM FROM BG_BRAND WHERE BRAND_ID = A.BRAND_ID) AS BRAND_NM , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.MOD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS MOD_DT FROM BG_CONTENTS_SERIES A WHERE 1=1
